Text: This is one of those torrents where you are told to go somewhere else to get the code because it is incrypted, but you have to buy something or download something and I still didn't get it,  So I am  very confused here
I do not seed these when I find them because I can't seem to get the code to unlock it.  Maybe someone can help

@bobbikalule

@yTSa6, yes I did download and tried to open and it tells me that I need a password, there is also a text file that tells me that it is actually a encrypted file because of some copyright issues and it tells you to go to a particular website for the password and at that time, the site tries to get you to sign up for various things, and still there is no password.  If I am wrong then tell me the code

This torrent has no problems; there are three (3) .WMV videos files, and NO password is required. I downloaded this 2 days ago, and have opened all 3 of the .WMV's. If you are getting other results, it is your problem, not the uploader.
THanks yTSa6
